product_name: Navy Blue Polyurethane Cord Pool Mosaic
product_description: Mosaics that are durable, vibrant, and perfect for stunning pool designs.

product_categories.category_name: Internal Wall Linings, finishes and partition systems

price_adjustment_structure: Priced based on m2 purchased, starting from $42/m2 inc. GST
lead_time: Usually available immediately on site at Smithfield
water_reduction_techniques: Non-treated water is used, as per Spanish laws, the Industrial areas don’t have access (conducts) of treated water.
minimisation_design_strategy: Follow the recommendations set out in the placement guide
modern_slavery_comments:
Togama S.A.U is firmly committed to equality and inclusion. We have an Equality Plan that complies with all regulations established by current European legislation. This plan is designed to ensure fairness in the workplace, promoting equal opportunities and preventing any form of discrimination. 

Togama S.A.U are continuously evaluating and improving our policies to ensure that all internal processes align with the principles of justice and equality, in accordance with the highest standards required by European legislation. 

Togama S.A.U are also an official collaborator for social inclusion with the Spanish Down Syndrome association.
factory_finished_description:
Gloss finish. 
Pool Internal Wall and Floor application only.
other_comments: Our mission is to drive change in our industry by making a conscious effort to shift the way in which we source and procure products.
